attributes.action: scrap all quangos and see if anyone notices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sick of my taxes being wasted and quangos are one example of the government doing exactly that.

Maybe some of them are useful, it's difficult to tell, but scrapping all of them is one way to find out which we need and which are just wasting money.
